answers.answer: Support includes resources like food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, and volunteers. Additionally, assistance with temporary accommodation and a phrase book for common Romanian expressions translated into English and Ukrainian are offered.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: You can get involved by sharing posters and flyers in crowded places, offering resources such as food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, or volunteers through "Sprijin de Urgență", or providing a space for temporary accommodation via "Un Acoperiș".
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Available resources include food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, and volunteers. A guide with common expressions in Romanian, translated into English and Ukrainian, is also provided.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: You can find temporary accommodation or offer a space to help vulnerable people by accessing "Un Acoperiș".
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: The provided content does not specify when this support is available.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/useful-resources and read the page carefully.
